summary: This module integrates with Vertex AI and Google AI Studio to facilitate image generation requests. It includes a handler that manages synchronous and asynchronous API calls, validates responses, and converts results into a uniform image representation, as well as a utility that computes the monetary cost of each generation request based on model pricing and usage details.
business_intent: Provide developers with a seamless way to generate images via Vertex AI/Google AI Studio while offering transparent cost estimation for budgeting and billing purposes.
